name: Facebook Reel
primary_goal_vibe: Organic reach expansion, fast discovery, entertainment, and lightweight education inside the Facebook ecosystem.
tone_preference: Dynamic, direct, and engaging. Lighter than feed posts, but still community-oriented.

copy_guidelines.copy_best_practices: The visual hook is the primary performance driver. The caption should briefly reinforce what the viewer is about to see and clearly state why it matters. Avoid long explanations.
copy_guidelines.caption_structure_hint: Line 1: reinforce the visual hook. Line 2: micro-context or benefit. Final line: short CTA.
cta_examples: Share this with someone who needs it

on_screen_text_guidelines.primary_role: Carry the main message and hook for sound-off viewing.

hashtags_mentions.recommended_hashtags: 0–5 relevant hashtags, used only if they add topical clarity.
hashtags_mentions.hashtag_strategy: Hashtags play a secondary role. Engagement behavior drives distribution.
hashtags_mentions.mention_strategy: Tag creators, collaborators, or featured pages when applicable.

technical_constraints.safe_area_note: Keep critical text and subjects away from top and bottom UI overlays.

required_elements: Strong visual hook in the first seconds
Clear value or promise on screen
disallowed_practices: Slow intros with no immediate value
Clickbait hooks that do not match the content
